Filter

About

The Filter Component is a list of categories used to get more granular results in a search. With JavaScript enabled, the Filter Component will toggle open or closed.

All Programs
  • All Programs
  • Cash & Expenses
  • Child Care
  • City ID Card
  • Education
  • Enrichment
  • Family Services
  • Food
  • Health
  • Housing
  • Special Needs
  • Work

  <a class="c-filter__header active" data-js="filter" href="#filter__list">All Programs</a>
  <ul class="c-filter__list active" id="filter__list">
    <li><span class="c-filter__item">All Programs</span></li>

Multi Filter

The Multi Filter Component allows for multiple selections and nested filter categories.

  • Expand categoryCollapse category
  • Expand categoryCollapse category
  • Expand categoryCollapse category 
<div class="c-filter-multi active bg-color-white" data-sketch-symbol="components/filter/filter-multi">
  <ul class="c-filter-multi__list">
    <li class="c-filter-multi__item">
      <div class="c-filter-multi__item-header">
        <label class="checkbox">
          <input data-toggles="#" type="checkbox" /><span class="checkbox__label">Cash &amp; Expenses</span></label>
        <a class="c-filter-multi__item-header-toggle active" data-js="filter" href="#cash-and-expenses"><span class="c-filter-multi__item-header-expand">Expand category</span><span class="c-filter-multi__item-header-collapse">Collapse category</span></a>
      </div>
      <div aria-hidden="false" class="c-filter-multi__item-group active" id="cash-and-expenses">
        <ul class="c-filter-multi__item-group-list">
          <li class="c-filter-multi__item-group-subitem">
            <label class="checkbox">
              <input type="checkbox" value="6871" /><span class="checkbox__label text-font-size-small font-normal">Home Energy Assistance Program (HEAP)</span></label>
          </li>
          <li class="c-filter-multi__item-group-subitem">
            <label class="checkbox">
              <input type="checkbox" value="6868" /><span class="checkbox__label text-font-size-small font-normal">Earned Income Tax Credit (EITC)</span></label>
          </li>
        </ul>
      </div>
    </li>
    <li class="c-filter-multi__item">
      <div class="c-filter-multi__item-header">
        <label class="checkbox">
          <input data-toggles="#program-child-care" type="checkbox" /><span class="checkbox__label">Child Care</span></label>
        <a class="c-filter-multi__item-header-toggle active" data-js="filter" href="#child-care"><span class="c-filter-multi__item-header-expand">Expand category</span><span class="c-filter-multi__item-header-collapse">Collapse category</span></a>
      </div>
      <div aria-hidden="false" class="c-filter-multi__item-group active" id="child-care">
        <ul class="c-filter-multi__item-group-list">
          <li class="c-filter-multi__item-group-subitem">
            <label class="checkbox">
              <input type="checkbox" value="6866" /><span class="checkbox__label text-font-size-small font-normal">EarlyLearn Child Car</span></label>

            <label class="checkbox">
              <input type="checkbox" value="6867"><span class="checkbox__label text-font-size-small font-normal">EarlyLearn Head Start</span></input>

      </div>
      <li class="c-filter-multi__item">

        </div>
      </li>
    </li>
  </ul>
</div>

Develop

Global Script

The Filter Component requires JavaScript for functionality and screen reader accessibility. To use the Filter in the global ACCESS NYC Patterns script use the following code:

var access = new AccessNyc();
access.filter();

This function will attach the filter toggling event to the body of the document.

Module

The ES6, CommonJS, and IFFE modules all require importing and object instantiation in your main script:

import Filter from 'components/filter/filter.common';
new Filter();
